data.message: I am missing many albums! Priceless photos of my daughter's first year of life are gone! Please bring my albums back!

replies.message: Hi Brandi. Sometimes when we do maintenance on the site, some photos or albums may temporarily disappear. If you're missing photos, please wait a few hours to see if they reappear. If your photos are still missing after a few hours, report a problem: https://www.facebook.com/help/186570224871049. -Jessica
Facebook it has been at least 24hrs. I have already reported the problem. Please look into this
